channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Moda in Pelle Sale
channel.desc: Get up to 50% off stylish Moda in Pelle shoes. You'll find fashionable footwear that combines affordable luxury and complete comfort right here.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade up to 50% off
channel.desc: Whatever your outerwear needs, Centigrade has it covered! You'll find a wide variety of coats and jackets in different styles, designs and materials - all with up to 50% off.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Sleepwear
channel.desc: Snuggle up in style with up to 50% off sleepwear at QVC. From cosy pyjama sets to dreamy dressing gowns, elevate your nightwear collection with our unmissable deals.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Footwear Sale
channel.desc: A fan of fashionable footwear? Find a new pair or two and save up to 50% on a range of stylish and comfortable footwear in our sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale
channel.desc: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sosandar Fashion
channel.desc: Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Tretorn Outerwear
channel.desc: Whether you adore city life or you're a nature lover, find stylish and high-quality outerwear from Tretorn, a fashion range designed for outdoor adventures.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags
channel.desc: Discover a curated selection of designer handbags, as we showcase brands such as Osprey, Radley, Paul Costelloe and Aimee Kestenberg among others.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kipling on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Discover your new favourite bag from Kipling and spread the cost in four interest-free instalments too! From clever cross-bodies to terrific totes, find your next bag on offer right here.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade Outerwear
channel.desc: A wide range of high-quality, fashion-inspired coats and jackets in soft, luxurious fabrics. This competitively-priced collection is designed to complete your daytime or evening look to perfection.
